OM_Karlach_COM.synopsis: Karlach is in the party and meets the leader of the paladins of Tyr while she is nearby

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM.synopsis: Avatar and Orphan Origin Moment for Karlach meeting the paladins of Tyr that leads into combat.
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM.how_to_trigger: Play as Avatar Karlach or move the rest of the party away if she is a companion and speak with Anders (WLD_Main_A: 111; 38; 561)

OM_Karlach_COM_41.speaker: Anders
OM_Karlach_COM_41.text: Please - no more! Leave us in peace, and we shall leave you in kind.

OM_Karlach_COM_55.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_COM_55.text: Cut the crap, Anders. I know what you are.

OM_Karlach_COM_59.speaker: Anders
OM_Karlach_COM_59.text: Don't let her hurt us - please, we just want to go home.

OM_Karlach_COM_0.speaker: Player
OM_Karlach_COM_0.text: You don't fear Karlach; you want to kill her on Zariel's behalf.

OM_Karlach_COM_26.speaker: Anders
OM_Karlach_COM_26.text: Ha. I never was good at playing the coward. There is no beast here or in the Hells I fear; not with Her Ladyship's protection. Least of all this dog.

OM_Karlach_COM_54.speaker: Player
OM_Karlach_COM_54.text: You'll need to convince me you're not who she says you are.

OM_Karlach_COM_70.speaker: Anders
OM_Karlach_COM_70.text: I'll tell you whatever you wish to know. Just let us live - please.

OM_Karlach_COM_17.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_COM_17.text: They serve the archdevil Zariel. Biggest liar in all the realms. Seems her servants have picked up some of mummy's tricks.

OM_Karlach_COM_40.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_COM_40.text: Believe me, these sneaky fucks won't stop 'til they have me hogtied at her feet.

OM_Karlach_COM_42.speaker: Anders
OM_Karlach_COM_42.text: It isn't true. Half of us are badly injured; the other half dead. I admit we ambushed you - an assignment from our god Tyr.

OM_Karlach_COM_28.speaker: Anders
OM_Karlach_COM_28.text: We thought you a devil. And with your flames you proved us right.

OM_Karlach_COM_63.speaker: Anders
OM_Karlach_COM_63.text: But Tyr will not consign us to our death. He is merciful. Leave us, and we'll leave you.

OM_Karlach_COM_46.speaker: Player
OM_Karlach_COM_46.text: Enough of this charade. I know who you really are.

OM_Karlach_COM_2.speaker: Player
OM_Karlach_COM_2.text: You say you serve Tyr. Recite the Creed of the Left Hand.

OM_Karlach_COM_50.speaker: Anders
OM_Karlach_COM_50.text: Wh - I - please, I am wounded. Overcome. I can hardly remember my own name.

OM_Karlach_COM_73.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_COM_73.text: I'll rip your tongue out, you liar.

OM_Karlach_COM_51.speaker: Player
OM_Karlach_COM_51.text: There's something wrong here. I can sense it in my bones.

OM_Karlach_COM_12.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_COM_12.text: You can't possibly believe this shit.
OM_Karlach_COM_12.context: CinematicNodeContext: Her flames begin to rageNodeContext: beseeching

OM_Karlach_COM_9.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_COM_9.text: Go on if you want. But I can't.

OM_Karlach_COM_10.speaker: Anders
OM_Karlach_COM_10.text: That's right, Karlach. So now as in the Hells. I can see why Her Ladyship wants a murderous brute like you back.
OM_Karlach_COM_10.context: NodeContext: stronger in tone, with an edge in his voice; the mask is slipping

OM_Karlach_COM_45.speaker: Player
OM_Karlach_COM_45.text: 'Her Ladyship' Zariel? I thought you served Tyr?

OM_Karlach_COM_29.speaker: Anders
OM_Karlach_COM_29.text: Enough - enough. I'll not play pretend anymore. Karlach, you're going home in pieces if needs must. And you - you'll soon learn what it means to ally yourself with the likes of this garbage.
OM_Karlach_COM_29.context: NodeContext: Dropping the 'wounded guy' act; turning steely and evil. Latter half is addressed to player

OM_Karlach_COM_56.speaker: Player
OM_Karlach_COM_56.text: Stand down, Karlach, or I'll have to intervene.

OM_Karlach_COM_68.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_COM_68.text: Pretty please, try. I'm in the mood for destruction.

OM_Karlach_COM_48.speaker: Player
OM_Karlach_COM_48.text: I won't let you hurt these people.

OM_Karlach_COM_8.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_COM_8.text: These aren't people. Not really. I don't want to fight you, but I'm not letting them go.

OM_Karlach_COM_13.speaker: Player
OM_Karlach_COM_13.text: You've made your choice, Karlach. Now you'll face the consequence. Me.

OM_Karlach_COM_16.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_COM_16.text: Pity. I could've used a friend. But if you choose to lie down with devils, you wake up with my boot in your arse.

OM_Karlach_COM_6.speaker: Player
OM_Karlach_COM_6.text: You're certain they're servants of Zariel?

OM_Karlach_COM_66.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_COM_66.text: These pricks deserve it more than anyone you've ever met.

OM_Karlach_COM_69.speaker: Player
OM_Karlach_COM_69.text: I'm putting my trust in you. Do what you will.

OM_Karlach_COM_27.speaker: Player
OM_Karlach_COM_27.text: You can't be certain. And I can't let you hurt them.

OM_Karlach_COM_34.speaker: Player
OM_Karlach_COM_34.text: I'm willing to put my trust in you, if you're certain these people are dangerous.

OM_Karlach_COM_25.speaker: Anders
OM_Karlach_COM_25.text: You'd do well to reconsider your alliance with this animal. She destroys all she touches. Useful in the Blood War; frighteningly dangerous anywhere else.

OM_Karlach_COM_72.speaker: Anders
OM_Karlach_COM_72.text: Rage all you want, Karlach. Burn with the might of the Hells. Zariel will find you; she will bring you home in pieces, and your little friends will have to watch. Unless we feed you their eyeballs first.

OM_Karlach_COM_76.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_COM_76.text: Avernus was never my home. It was my prison. I'm free now. AND I'M NEVER GOING BACK.
OM_Karlach_COM_76.context: CinematicNodeContext: Burning at max; combat starts.NodeContext: Barbarian rage

OM_Karlach_COM_21.speaker: Anders
OM_Karlach_COM_21.text: You and your foolish friend can rage all you want, Karlach. Zariel will never let you go; return home now and spare your comrades - and yourself - a gruesome death.

OM_Karlach_COM_58.speaker: Player
OM_Karlach_COM_58.text: You can drop the act. I know you're servants of Zariel.

OM_Karlach_COM_57.speaker: Anders
OM_Karlach_COM_57.text: Zariel?! Certainly not - we serve Tyr, Lord of Justice, and no other.

OM_Karlach_COM_5.speaker: Anders
OM_Karlach_COM_5.text: Please, mercy. Half of us are badly injured; the other half dead. I admit we ambushed you - an assignment from our god Tyr.

OM_Karlach_COM_44.speaker: Player
OM_Karlach_COM_44.text: Assess his posture, his eyes - is he telling the truth?

OM_Karlach_COM_31.speaker: Narrator
OM_Karlach_COM_31.text: *There's something in the squint of his eye. You suspect he's lying.*

OM_Karlach_COM_3.speaker: Anders
OM_Karlach_COM_3.text: The Archduchess will be delighted when we return with Karlach's head on a pike.

OM_Karlach_COM_30.speaker: Anders
OM_Karlach_COM_30.text: What sort of devilment is this?! Paladins - to arms! This one is with the fiend.

OM_Karlach_COM_62.speaker: Anders
OM_Karlach_COM_62.text: You brought her here?! We won't survive another assault. Leave us in peace, and we shall leave you in kind.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_29.speaker: Anders
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_29.text: That's right, Karlach. So now as in the Hells. I can see why Her Ladyship wants a murderous brute like you back.
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_29.context: NodeContext: stronger in tone, with an edge in his voice; the mask is slipping

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_13.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_13.text: 'Her Ladyship'. Zariel really has you under her thumb, doesn't she? Pathetic.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_7.speaker: Anders
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_7.text: Rage all you want, Karlach. Burn with the might of the Hells. Zariel will find you, and she will bring you back in pieces.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_40.speaker: Anders
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_40.text: Then again, maybe she'll just leave you here. Far from home, with an infernal engine for a heart, slowly burning you to ash from the inside.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_34.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_34.text: Avernus was never my home. It was my prison. I'm free now. AND I'M NEVER GOING BACK.
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_34.context: CinematicNodeContext: Burning at max; combat starts.NodeContext: Barbarian rage

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_43.speaker: Anders
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_43.text: Paladins, to arms! The devil has found us.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_67.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_67.text: Whoa now. I think you're confusing me with someone else.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_57.speaker: Anders
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_57.text: Our lord Tyr told us of your guise: The one-horned tiefling hiding the devil within. Servant of Zariel, soldier of the Blood War.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_21.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_21.text: Tyr - god of justice, isn't that right? If you really serve him, you'll know I never served Zariel willingly.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_60.speaker: Anders
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_60.text: The god of Justice never speaks false.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_1.speaker: Narrator
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_1.text: *The god of Justice may not be a liar, but this so-called 'paladin' most certainly is.*

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_11.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_11.text: Enough of the theatrics. Who are you really?

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_66.speaker: Anders
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_66.text: You always were sharper than Her Ladyship gave you credit for.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_61.speaker: Anders
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_61.text: 'My Karlach is a cudgel,' she'd say. 'No finesse to speak of, but useful for cracking skulls.'

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_51.speaker: Anders
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_51.text: She made you what you are, Karlach. She wants you to come home. Alive, if possible. Dead, if not.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_38.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_38.text: You should've skipped the 'paladins of Tyr' gimmick and faced me for what you are.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_30.speaker: Anders
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_30.text: Better not to scare off a wild animal until you're ready to spring your trap.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_58.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_58.text: Avernus was never my home. It was my prison. I'm never going back.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_16.speaker: Anders
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_16.context: NodeContext: Right before combat, so vamping up in evilness.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_2.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_2.text: Fine. I'll go quietly. Me and Zariel can settle this face-to-face.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_63.speaker: Anders
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_63.text: Did you hear that, fellows? Karlach wants us to let down our guard, shackle her, then burn us to cinders en route back to Avernus.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_6.speaker: Anders
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_6.text: Knock her out. And if she dies in the attempt, all the better.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_48.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_48.text: I'd rather die than look at her fucking face ever again.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_27.speaker: Anders
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_27.text: I serve Tyr, from now until my dying day. And he has ruled for your execution, devil.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_64.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_64.text: Tell me who you really are, and maybe we can find another way to settle this.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_23.speaker: Anders
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_23.text: Diplomacy! Interesting. But I suppose you were always more complex than Her Ladyship gave you credit for.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_17.speaker: Anders
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_17.text: Paladins, ho! Tonight we decorate our hall with this devil's last horn.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_33.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_33.text: Everything I did in Avernus was against my will. I never wanted to serve Zariel - not for a second.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_42.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_42.text: 'Slave' more than 'soldier'. Whatever I've done was against my will.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_0.speaker: Anders
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_0.text: 'If your right hand commits injustice, remove it with your left.' If you were truly just, you would not have let yourself be used in such a fashion.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_49.speaker: Narrator
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_49.text: *That is no maxim of Tyr - nor a Tyrran belief. The Just God does not hold underlings responsible for the commands of tyrants.*

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_39.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_39.text: I didn't let Zariel do anything. I had no choice.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_52.speaker: Anders
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_52.text: Save your excuses for the City of Judgement. Perhaps Tyr will take pity on you there, for he is the head of justice. We are merely its sword.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_65.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_65.text: You've got to reconsider. I don't want to hurt you.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_56.speaker: Anders
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_56.text: Then your last words will be a lie, will they? I'd expect no different from the likes of you.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_8.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_8.text: What do you want, then? A fight? Cause I'll give you one.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_10.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_10.text: I don't have time for this. I didn't come here for a fight, but if you want one, I'm game.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_53.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_53.text: I'm no devil. What's this all about?

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_54.speaker: Anders
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_54.text: You lie so easily. But I suppose it is easy for your kind. Tyr warned us not to believe a word out of your mouth, servant of Zariel.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_26.speaker: Karlach
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_26.text: I'm going to start behaving like a devil if you keep calling me one.

OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_47.speaker: Anders
OM_Karlach_AOM_OOM_47.text: I know what you are. And your threats mean nothing. A servant of Zariel has no power here. The Just God Tyr has claimed these roads.
